  • Constructor Details

    • EvalContext

      public EvalContext(List<Bytecode> instructions, int nextAddress, Stack<Value> values, Deque<Scope> scopes, Deque<CursorId> selectionHistory, javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext graphics)
      Create a new evaluation context.
      Parameters:
      instructions - the instruction set to execute
      nextAddress - the address of the next instruction to execute
      values - the stack of the manipulated values
      scopes - the execution/scopes stack
      selectionHistory - the cursor selection history
      graphics - the graphics context to draw on

    • setValue

      public void setValue(String name, Value value) throws MissingVariableException, TypeMismatchException
      Set the value of an accessible variable.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the variable
      value - the value to assign to the variable
      Throws:
      MissingVariableException - if no variable with the given name exists
      TypeMismatchException - if the type of the value and the type of the variable don't match

      Parameters:
      name - the name of the variable
      variable - the declared variable
      Throws:
      TypeMismatchException - if the type of the value and the type of the variable don't match
      VariableAlreadyExistsException - if a variable with the given name already exists
